title: Le'Veon Bell, Browns, QB rules, and why offense matters
itunes:title: Le'Veon Bell, Browns, QB rules, and why offense matters
description:
Colin explains why yesterday was a bad day for Pittsburgh Steelers RB Le'Veon Bell, why the Cleveland Browns should be happy, the rules protecting quarterbacks, and why offense is so important in the NFL. Guests include David Carr, Greg Jennings, and Trent Dilfer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
